title: Oracle | MTS | Bengaluru
content:
Education: CSE from Tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 1.5
Prior Experience: a startup
Company: Oracle
Title/Level: MTS 
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 20L (base) + 1L (PF contribution)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: $20K vested over 4 years
Bonus: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~24 lpa for year 1
Benefits: standard Oracle benefits
Other details: accepted offer
